text: registration contract and disclosure requirements for a paid solicitor amend rsa vi a to read as follows a prior to orally requesting a contribution or contemporaneously with a written request for a contribution the following shall be clearly and conspicuously disclosed at the point of solicitation the name of the paid solicitor as on file with the attorney general and that the solicitation is being conducted by a paid solicitor the information required under paragraph if requested by the contributor the fixed percentage of the gross revenue or the reasonable estimate expressed as a percentage of the gross revenue as identified in paragraph v of this section new paragraph required disclosure prior to solicitation on behalf of a police or law enforcement association amend rsa by inserting after paragraph vi the following new paragraph any person who solicits contributions by telephone on behalf of a police or law enforcement association shall at the beginning of the call clearly identify themselves to the individual contacted and state the purpose of the call that the individual contacted is not in any legal trouble that the individual may refuse to make a donation without facing any legal repercussions or retaliation from the police and that the individual has the right to refuse to be contacted at a future time
